results.title: [Ivabradine for Treatment of Heart Failure with Preserved Ejection Fraction].
results.text_hl: All @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ were on a chronic background therapy, including angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitors (@<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@) or, if not tolerated, angiotensin II receptor blockers (@CHEMICAL_Valsartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068756 @@@valsartan@@@), antiaggregants, statins (@CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Rosuvastatin_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068718 @@@rosuvastatin@@@), and short-acting @CHEMICAL_Nitrates @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009566 @@@nitrates@@@ as required.

citations.NLM: Babushkina GV, Shaikhlislamova GI. [Ivabradine for Treatment of Heart Failure with Preserved Ejection Fraction]. Kardiologiia. 2020 Oct 10;60(10):33-37. PMID: 33228503
